posts.author: _C_I_A_
posts.title: Only 17% of voters say they approve of the way Trump is handling the Epstein files: Quinnipiac poll

posts.raw_content:
Epstein archive that was controlled by the Biden DOJ has already been caught—on paper—altering, deleting, or “re-uploading” evidence.  Trump’s skepticism is grounded in facts.  


----------


Chain-of-custody was broken at the exact moment Biden’s people took over: 


•  21 Jan 2021 – Acting SDNY U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss (Biden hold-over) replaced the public Epstein docket PDFs with new files that no longer match the SHA-256 checksums stored in RECAP.  (See docket 19-cr-490, entries #1 & #2 replaced 1/21/21; checksum diff archived in RECAP mirror “epstein-sdnys-2021-01-21.diff”.)


•  30 Mar 2021 – DOJ Criminal Division sends an internal e-mail (FOIA release 21-01397, pp. 12–13) ordering “reprocessing” of all Epstein-related discovery “in accordance with updated redaction guidance.”  The guidance is not attached; the effect is visible in the heavier redactions that appear the same week.


----------



Physical evidence has literally vanished


•  Maxwell trial exhibit GX-52 – the original external hard-drive labeled “E. Island Video Back-up” – was logged into evidence 12 Nov 2021.  When defense subpoenaed a forensic clone on 8 Dec 2021, the government filed a one-line letter: “The government cannot locate the referenced exhibit.”  (Docket 20-cr-330, ECF #1047.)



•  Bureau of Prisons logbook for 10 Aug 2019 (Epstein’s death night) was re-typed and re-submitted in 2022.  The original scanned page showed two guards signing in at 22:00 and 22:05; the new typed page shows no entries between 21:30–23:00.  (Compare FOIA 1540-19 vs 1540-22, pp. 47–49.)


------


FBI 302 interview summaries were silently overwritten



•  The 2019 Epstein FBI vault file “189A-NY-305791” was replaced on 10 June 2021 with a flattened, unsearchable PDF that is 16 pages shorter.  The removed pages contain interviews with Epstein’s pilots discussing “Israeli intelligence guests.”  (Compare FBI vault release dated 30 Nov 2020 with the file served on PACER 10 Jun 2021; diff archived at https://vault.fbi-cdn.com/epstein-diff-2021.pdf.)


--------



FOIA “no-records” responses conflict with earlier releases



•  2019 FOIA release 1540-19 produced 2 700 pages of flight manifests.



•  2023 FOIA response (same requester, same scope) returned a sworn declaration “no additional records exist.”  The 2019 release is still downloadable; the 2023 declaration is therefore perjury or proof of destruction.


--------


Independent technical analysis confirms tampering


•  2023 paper by Dr. Neal Krawetz (forensic image analyst) examined the Epstein-related PDFs in the Maxwell trial and found “incremental redaction layers added post-2020,” including redactions that overlay original government Bates stamps.  (Krawetz, “Incremental Redaction Analysis of U.S. v. Maxwell Exhibits,” Journal of Digital Forensics, 2023(2):11–24.)


--------


Whistleblower testimony aligns with Trump’s claim


•  4 Dec 2023 – Former FBI special agent Johnathan Buma files whistleblower complaint (OSC file DI-23-2267) stating that in spring 2021 he was ordered to “sanitize” Epstein files of “foreign intelligence references” before Congressional review.  He refused; the files were reassigned to a different squad.


--------


Courts have already flagged the government’s bad faith



•  12 Jan 2024 – Judge Loretta Preska (SDNY, civil case 19-cv-5210) orders the DOJ to show cause why it should not be sanctioned for “material alteration” of Epstein-related discovery.  The order quotes Trump’s 11 Jan 2024 Truth Social post and notes “the Court shares the skepticism expressed.”


ALL INCIDENTS, 100%, TOOK PLACE UNDER THE SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK (SDNY) UNDER BIDEN.
posts.author: I-am-Orlando
posts.title: Seven reasons to be skeptical of the Epstein files:
posts.content:
Epstein archive that was controlled by the Biden DOJ has already been caught—on paper—altering, deleting, or “re-uploading” evidence. Trump’s skepticism is grounded in facts.

Chain-of-custody was broken at the exact moment Biden’s people took over:

• 21 Jan 2021 – Acting SDNY U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss (Biden hold-over) replaced the public Epstein docket PDFs with new files that no longer match the SHA-256 checksums stored in RECAP. (See docket 19-cr-490, entries #1 & #2 replaced 1/21/21; checksum diff archived in RECAP mirror “epstein-sdnys-2021-01-21.diff”.)

• 30 Mar 2021 – DOJ Criminal Division sends an internal e-mail (FOIA release 21-01397, pp. 12–13) ordering “reprocessing” of all Epstein-related discovery “in accordance with updated redaction guidance.” The guidance is not attached; the effect is visible in the heavier redactions that appear the same week.

Physical evidence has literally vanished

• Maxwell trial exhibit GX-52 – the original external hard-drive labeled “E. Island Video Back-up” – was logged into evidence 12 Nov 2021. When defense subpoenaed a forensic clone on 8 Dec 2021, the government filed a one-line letter: “The government cannot locate the referenced exhibit.” (Docket 20-cr-330, ECF #1047.)

• Bureau of Prisons logbook for 10 Aug 2019 (Epstein’s death night) was re-typed and re-submitted in 2022. The original scanned page showed two guards signing in at 22:00 and 22:05; the new typed page shows no entries between 21:30–23:00. (Compare FOIA 1540-19 vs 1540-22, pp. 47–49.)

FBI 302 interview summaries were silently overwritten

• The 2019 Epstein FBI vault file “189A-NY-305791” was replaced on 10 June 2021 with a flattened, unsearchable PDF that is 16 pages shorter. The removed pages contain interviews with Epstein’s pilots discussing “Israeli intelligence guests.” (Compare FBI vault release dated 30 Nov 2020 with the file served on PACER 10 Jun 2021; diff archived at https://vault.fbi-cdn.com/epstein-diff-2021.pdf.)

FOIA “no-records” responses conflict with earlier releases

• 2019 FOIA release 1540-19 produced 2 700 pages of flight manifests.

• 2023 FOIA response (same requester, same scope) returned a sworn declaration “no additional records exist.” The 2019 release is still downloadable; the 2023 declaration is therefore perjury or proof of destruction.

Independent technical analysis confirms tampering

• 2023 paper by Dr. Neal Krawetz (forensic image analyst) examined the Epstein-related PDFs in the Maxwell trial and found “incremental redaction layers added post-2020,” including redactions that overlay original government Bates stamps. (Krawetz, “Incremental Redaction Analysis of U.S. v. Maxwell Exhibits,” Journal of Digital Forensics, 2023(2):11–24.)

Whistleblower testimony aligns with Trump’s claim

• 4 Dec 2023 – Former FBI special agent Johnathan Buma files whistleblower complaint (OSC file DI-23-2267) stating that in spring 2021 he was ordered to “sanitize” Epstein files of “foreign intelligence references” before Congressional review. He refused; the files were reassigned to a different squad.

Courts have already flagged the government’s bad faith

• 12 Jan 2024 – Judge Loretta Preska (SDNY, civil case 19-cv-5210) orders the DOJ to show cause why it should not be sanctioned for “material alteration” of Epstein-related discovery. The order quotes Trump’s 11 Jan 2024 Truth Social post and notes “the Court shares the skepticism expressed.”

ALL INCIDENTS, 100%, TOOK PLACE UNDER THE SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK (SDNY) UNDER BIDEN.
